title: Find the trace of a matrix
contentHtml:
Write a program to find the trace of a matrix

The trace of a square matrix is the sum of the elements on the main diagonal (from the upper left to the lower right).

Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
15

markdown:
## Write a program to find the trace of a matrix

The trace of a square matrix is the sum of the elements on the main diagonal (from the upper left to the lower right).

```
Input  :
1 2 3
4 5 6
7 8 9

Output :
15
```
